Text: Avis RealTime Reservations ConfirmationRealTime Reservations Confirmation NOTE If you cancelled your reservation immediately after processing please disregard this confirmation Thank you for choosing Avis The following information was calculated based on the information shown below that you provided to us Changes in pickup or return location car group dates or times may change this rate This rate is for renters years of age or older with a major credit card in their name Listed below is your reservation confirmation Reservation Number US Your rate for the day period is USD Mileage Unlimited free MilesKilometers Surcharge Up to per day Vehicle License Fee Tax Approximate Total USD You requested a reservation for PickUp Location John Wayne Airport SNA PickUp Date Friday May PickUp Time PM Return Location John Wayne Airport SNA Return Date Monday May Return Time PM Car Group IntermediatePontiac Grand Am or similar Name MARK TAYLOR AWD L Frequent Flyer CONTINENTAL AIRLINES SC For additional information on the PickUp Location please go to LSTAMNESNA If you need to REVIEW or CANCEL this reservation please go to RRESNOUSLASTNAMETAYLOR You will need both your Reservation Number US and Last Name TAYLOR to enter If you did not make this reservation please send an email with the above rental information to Debit Check or Cash Cards are not accepted as credit identification at the beginning of an auto rental An Avis honored charge card or an Avis Cash Prepayment ID Card is required at the beginning of the rental Debit Check or Cash Cards can be used at the end of the rental for payment of rental charges Thank you for booking your auto with Avis Rent A Car Avis Rent A Car USBBCRL
